whatsNew.en-US:
v0.3.1
- fixes bug where Android 12+ refuses to install the app (#35).

v0.3.0
- adds quick settings tile that displays the current hour.
- adds daydream (screen saver) that shows a "wandering clock".
- adds fullscreen mode, ability to display over the lock screen, and home screen wallpaper option.
- adds clock option; show "seconds hand" and inner dial.
- adds clock option; "6hr time format" (Italian six-hour clock).
- adds clock option; equinoctial hours; "Babylonian", "Italic", "Italian Civil

- adds option to the solstice and moon dialogs to only show the number of days remaining.
- adds "gradually increase volume (curve)" to alarm options (defaults to cubic).
- fixes bug where "gradually increase volume" is only applied to the left channel.
- fixes app crash when using menu actions while refreshing location (#862).
- fixes app crash when toggling wallpaper from the theme configuration activity.
- fixes bug where "flippable widget fails to change views" (#855).
- additional miscellan
